titleInfo.title: Various Song Excerpts - Old museum music row location - New Artist Gallery exhibition

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Various recording excerpts of performances featuring Marty Robbins (performer), Lynn Anderson (performer), Bobby Bare (performer), The Browns (performance group), Jim Reeves (performer), Tex Ritter (performer), Glen Campbell (performer), Waylon Jennings (performer), Wilma Lee (performer), Stoney Cooper (performer), Little Dippers (performance group), Bobby Edwards (performer), Dave Dudley (performer), Linda Ronstadt (performer), Tompall Glaser (performer), Bobby Goldsboro (performer), Billy Grammer (performer), Jack Greene (performer), Merle Haggard (performer), Tom T. Hall (performer), Buck Owens (performer), David Houston (performer), Jan Howard (performer), Stonewall Jackson (performer), Brenda Lee (performer), Ray Stevens (performer), George Jones (performer), Loretta Lynn (performer), Ray Price (performer), Woody Guthrie (performer), Foggy Mountain Boys (performance group), Osborne Brothers (performance group), Patsy Montana and the Prairie Ramblers (performance group), Hank Thompson (performer), George Martin (performer), Ferlin Husky (performer), Dolly Parton(performer), Elvis Presley (performer), Charlie Pride (performer), Jerry Reed (performer), Del Reeves (performer), Jeannie C. Riley (performer), Roy Rogers (performer), Lorrie Morgan (performer), Michael Cleveland (performer), Red Sovine (performer), The Statler Brothers (performer), Pee Wee King (performer), Mel Tillis (performer), Jimmy Wakely (performer), Dottie West (performer), Hank Williams Jr. (performer), Tex Williams (performer), Pat Boone (performer), Bing Crosby and the Andrews Sisters (performer), and Tammy Wynette (performer).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
